description._content:
Pupils and teacher of a class at Deseronto Public School, c.1920. The teacher is Mary Catherine Wallace, who married George Houle in 1922.

Some names have been given, on a separate sheet:

Back row, left to right: ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, Mary Catherine Wallace, ?, Mary Metcalfe, Berniece Perreault, Grace Gonyou, ?, Ella Shaw

2nd row from back : Eugene ?, Stanley Green, Donald Jendron, Arnold Farmer, Edward St. Louis, Keith Loughlin, Wilbert Loft, Sherman Thompson, Robert Crawford, Ruby Haynes, Margaret Hale

3rd row:  Eva (Garvey, Harvey or Carney), Hilda Plato, Dorothy Bowerman, Millie (Melissa) Houle, Hilda Burley, Cordelia Palmer, Margerie Rendall, Lillian Leafe, Marie Genereux, Thelma Joyce, Mary McVicker, Beatrice Harvey, Mary Hunt, Grace Shea, Kathleen Black

Front row: ?, George Covert, Arthur Ostrander, Russel Wagar, Frank Field, ? Burley, Ernest Dorey, Gerald McWain, Gordon Blake.
